message: I have a drobo (the original with newest firmware) and when I try to use it with my Mac Pro it keeps unmounting after about 30 minutes of use. This is when it's connected via firewire 800. When connected with the same cable to my older 24" iMac the drobo works ok. I can run other external hard drives via firewire 800 on my Mac Pro without issues. I like the concept of the drobo but I'm not sure I can trust it and I know I can't use it on my Mac Pro.
